name: Elite Dangerous: Horizons
description:
Elite Dangerous: Horizons is a simulation game developed by Frontier Developments. It came out on 15-12-2015. Frontier Developments published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Elite Dangerous: Horizons on PC.
It was produced by Michael Brookes. It was directed by David Braben. It was scored by Erasmus Talbot.
